title: Poster, "El Producto, for dad... with love and kisses", ca. 1953
medium: Offset lithograph on thin cream paper
signed: Signature imprinted in brown ink, lower left quadrant: Paul Rand
inscribed: Imprinted in green ink, in stencilled typeface, across upper edge of page: EL PRODUCTO®; beneath this, imprinted in brown ink, in "century"-like font, upper right quadrant: cigars; lower right quadrant: for Dad.../ with love/ and kisses; imprinted in green ink, lower left corner: No.17967  2-60  Printed in U.S.A.; imprinted in white on yellow and red cigar label, lower left quadrant: EL PRODUCTO/ CIGAR
description: On tan ground, imprinted in green, in a stencilled typeface (echoing stencils found on bales of tobacco), across upper edge, "EL PRODUCTO"; beneath this, imprinted in brown, in font similar to century, in upper right quadrant, "cigars". Lower right quadrant, imprinted in three lines, "for Dad...with love and kisses". Imprinted in red, three images of lips (upper left quadrant, upper right quadrant, and lower right quadrant). At center left an image of a man (in the form of a brown cigar), wearing yellow and red brimmed hat and holding a cigar in one hand and a cane in the other.  A product label, in white, red and yellow, is wrapped around the upper part of the cigar.
